title: Mobile Microlearning for Strengthening Core Competencies in Records Management

context.prior_knowledge: Basic document management and digital work environment comprehension
context.additional_context: ADDIE model-based practice-oriented design for efficient record management in corporate settings, providing content optimized for mobile environments.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically classify work documents by applying five record classification systems.
Learners can explain the three core principles of digital record preservation (authenticity, reliability, accessibility) in mobile environments.
Learners can perform an evaluation practice to determine corporate record disposal criteria with 80% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
